Posts.Content: Ask your doctor for an order for a mammogram. It was painless for me at a 40-C size breasts. If no insurance it will cost less than $100. Millions of men have large breasts, some larger & some smaller than mine. Good luck.
Posts.Title: embarrassed, male breast cancer? very worried

Posts.Content: Ask your doctor for an order for a mammogram. It was painless for me at a 40-C size breasts. If no insurance it will cost less than $100. Millions of men have large breasts, some larger & some smaller than mine. Good luck.
Posts.Title: embarrassed, male breast cancer? very worried

Posts.Content: Did the doctor mention gynecomastia? That is male breast growth. Millions of guys have it. I have had it since about age 12. It is usually caused by too much estradiol E2 in the body.
Posts.Title: Small firm lump - 18 yr old male
